snippet.title: CURSES Teaser Trailer  - Spells Like Teen Spirit
snippet.description:
CURSES is a hand drawn point-and-click game set in the 1990s where you play as Girl, an irreverent teenager caught in a web of troubles and dark feelings. Use magic like tarot cards, séances and terrible poetry to help her choose a path - curse everyone else or care for herself.
Wishlist on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1721100/CURSES/ 
Twitter - https://twitter.com/killjoygames 
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@killjoygames?lang=en
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/cursesgame/
